data.name: Project Arrhythmia
data.detailed_description:
Project Arrhythmia: A New Kind of Rhythm Game

Embark on a rhythmic adventure in which all things beautiful are deadly. Avoid the musically timed pulse of blocks and bars, and in the process you might just find out what this mysterious "Project Arrhythmia" is.


Story Mode

  • Contains 25 pulse pounding and challenging levels.
  • Over an hour of unique songs.
  • Branching story paths for a total of 4 endings.
  • Support for up to 4 players.

Arcade Mode

  • Classic: Play non-story levels and user created levels.
  • Infinite: A non-stop barrage of enemies in a completely infinitely generated level.
  • Snake: Rank up as many points as possible by eating pellets while growing larger and becoming easier to hit.
  • All modes support up to 4 players.

Level Editor

  • You get access to the very level editor used to make all the levels for Project Arrhythmia.
  • Full steam workshop integration to easily share your created levels.

Links

Twitter @projarrhythmia
Watch me make the game live!
Official Website

data.short_description: Project Arrhythmia is a rhythmic adventure in which all things beautiful are deadly. Avoid the musically timed pulse of blocks and bars, and in the process you might just find out what this mysterious "Project Arrhythmia" is.
data.reviews:
“Project Arrhythmia is a gloriously hypnotic audio/visual experience. A super cool rhythmic dodge-em-up.”
Alpha Beta Gamer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2+
  • Processor: 2 GHz or Higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8+
  • Processor: 3 GHz or Higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz or Higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz or Higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:

  • Processor: 2 GHz or Higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu or equivalent
  • Processor: 3 GHz or Higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
